Contributor: Leroux, Auguste, artist.; Commission Américaine de Préservation contre la Tuberculose en France, publisher.; Devambez (Firm), printer.;
Note: Signed "Auguste Leroux." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa No. 15996" appears on the bottom left side of the illustration. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French tells that the visitor of health will appear along the road to well-being. She leads the crusade. Illustration shows a woman in a coat holding a naked child.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : Commission Américaine de Préservation contre la Tuberculose en France,

Title: La visiteuse d'hygiène vous montrera
